description: VS Code Dev Containers: Definitions and Templates
name: vscode-dev-containers

scripts.prepack: rimraf containers-readmes manifests container-features && copyfiles --up 1 containers/**/README.md containers-readmes && copyfiles --up 1 containers/**/definition-manifest.json manifests && copyfiles --up 1 script-library/*.sh container-features && copyfiles --up 3 script-library/container-features/src/* container-features
